trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Device.Location" /> namespace allows application developers to easily access the computer's location by using a single API.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.Device.Location" /> permite que os desenvolvedores de aplicativos acessem facilmente o local do computador usando uma única API.

trans-unit.source: Location information may come from multiple providers, such as GPS, Wi-Fi triangulation, and cell phone tower triangulation.
trans-unit.target: Informações de local podem vir de vários provedores, como GPS, triangulação de Wi-Fi e triangulação de torre de telefone celular.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Device.Location" /> classes provide a single API to encapsulate the multiple location providers on a computer and support seamless prioritization and transitioning between them.
trans-unit.target: As classes <see cref="N:System.Device.Location" /> fornecem uma única API para encapsular os vários provedores de local em um computador e dar suporte à priorização contínua e à transição entre eles.

trans-unit.source: As a result, application developers who use this API do not need to tailor applications to specific hardware configurations.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, os desenvolvedores de aplicativos que usam essa API não precisam personalizar aplicativos para configurações específicas de hardware.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> class supplies location data that is based on latitude and longitude coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> coordenadas de dados de localização de fontes de classe que se baseia a latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver> and <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver> types provide the ability to resolve from a coordinate location to a civic address.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver> e <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver> tipos fornecem a capacidade de resolver uma coordenada local para um endereço civil.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Device.Location.IGeoPositionWatcher%601> interface can be implemented to extend the types of location data that are supplied.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Device.Location.IGeoPositionWatcher%601> interface pode ser implementada para estender os tipos de dados local que são fornecidos.

trans-unit.source: In Windows 7, all the <xref:System.Device.Location> classes are fully functional if a location provider is installed and can determine the computer's location.
trans-unit.target: No Windows 7, todos os <xref:System.Device.Location> classes são totalmente funcionais, se um provedor de local está instalado e pode determinar o local do computador.

trans-unit.source: On Windows 7 Starter Edition, the Default Location Provider that can be set in Control Panel is the only location provider that is supported.
trans-unit.target: No Windows 7 Starter Edition, o provedor local padrão que podem ser definidas no painel de controle é o provedor de único local com suporte.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply:
trans-unit.target: **Observação** nas versões do Windows anterior ao Windows 7, as seguintes condições se aplicam:

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os <xref:System.Device.Location> objetos que tenham construtores podem ser criados, mas o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> propriedade sempre terá o valor <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.

trans-unit.source: The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: O local indicado pelo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> sempre será <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.

trans-unit.source: No location events will be raised.
